query: select   m.id,m.name,  m.campaign_id,  cd.language_4 as lang,  mailing_type,  subject, scheduled_date,  r.value recipient,o.value open,click.value click from civicrm_mailing m join civicrm_campaign c on campaign_id=c.id join civicrm_value_speakout_integration_2 cd on entity_id=c.id LEFT JOIN data_mailing_counter r ON r.mailing_id=m.id AND r.counter='recipients' AND r.timebox=0 LEFT JOIN data_mailing_counter o ON o.mailing_id=m.id AND o.counter='opens' AND o.timebox=14400 LEFT JOIN data_mailing_counter click ON click.mailing_id=m.id AND click.counter='clicks' AND click.timebox=14400 where c.parent_id=%1
